caption.center: John DOWNEY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Judgment imposing a fine of $100 and confinement in the county jail for sixty days for violation of the Local Option Law.
opinion.attorneys:
Hall Smith for appellant.
Eldon S. Dummit, Attorney General, and H.K. Spear, Assistant Attorney General, for the Commonwealth.
